title: Who Says You Can't Go Home?
description: Sara Rhea is a young and intelligent woman with a bright future ahead of her. That is until she receives a call one morning informing her of her fatheras illness. Now she must return home and help run the family inn. She knew it wouldnat be easy, but she had no idea how difficult it would be. Not only does she have an ailing father and a sister she doesnat get along with to contend with, but she also has to deal with him. She didnat think shead ever see James, her old flame, again. Fate intervenes to bring them together, but will their old flame be reignited? Only time will tell.
author: Jaimie Hope
